title: importing an .mbox file without importing my gmail account details
creator: annesophie.heist
content:
Hi there,

I am trying to free up my Gmail Inbox and used Google Takeout to export a 14 GB .mbox file. I now want to import it into Thunderbird, I installed the add-on ImportExport Tools NG but somehow my Folder structure is not showing up for me to import the file. When I follow Tools- ImportExport Tools NG -Import profile it won't let me upload the file. On my left side I can see that my folder structure doesn't show any folders. Please advise how to proceed. I have attached screenshots for you to view. I do not want to IMAP import my Gmail account into Thunderbird as I will proceed deleted these files off my account to free up space and do not want this action to be mirrored in Thunderbird.

title: Display of inbox suddenly messed up (Thunderbird)
creator: fea_st
content:
After rebooting my Mac (MacOS 10.15.7) and opening Thunderbird (128.3.3esr), the inbox display looks messed up. The columns are in different places, and the headings don't match.

See the enclosed screenshot: The subject of the mail is listed under "Correspondents", the sender is listed below "Size", the column for the "favorite" icon (big star) is ridiculously wide and can't be made smaller, the column containing the "spam" symbol has the heading "Date". The column holding the date column is only showing about 3 characters of the date and can't be made wider.

When I worked yesterday, everything looked normal.

How can I fix this? What could possibly be have messed up the settings?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.15; rv:131.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/131.0

title: Status Bar Messages
creator: sdr21
content: When I first open Thunderbird 128.3.3esr, the Status Bar shows messages detailing the progress of querying email servers and of downloading messages. After a while, however, the progress text messages stop appearing in the Status Bar. Email messages download properly; there's just no text message in Status Bar showing progress. When this happens, the Online/Offline button also has disappeared. The blue bar on the right side of the Status Bar still shows up whenever a server is being queried. Is this a problem on my machine alone or with the program?

title: Why is back up far smaller than file on computer?
creator: EastTenn
content:
Following a tip I got on this forum, I have backed up Thunderbird to a flash drive for years.

Last night, my flash drive showed only 23.7 GB after the backup while the properties of the original data file showed 31.2 GB. What is going on?

We recently got Windows 11 not really by choice. Could this be the issue? I do NOT keep all email. I just keep a lot and it has mounted up over the years.

I do not want to lose 7.5 GB of email messages as one of those might be needed. The back up took almost an hour. That also is not normal.

title: thunderbird crash continuo
creator: gspagnuolo1
content: Buongiorno, uso Thunderbird su Macbook Pro con Apple M3 Max. Da due giorni (non in coincidenza con aggiornamenti sw anche del sistema operativo) Thunderbird mi si apre, scarica posta, funziona normalmente ma dopo circa 30 secondi crasha. Ho provato ad avviarlo in modalità Risoluzione Problemi e lo fa lo stesso. Anche disconnettendomi dalla rete internet, stesso comportamento. La versione è quella più aggiornata. Come posso risolvere? Se installo nuovamente Thunderbird, perdo le cartelle locali di posta? Il tempo durante il quale rimane in funzione è anche troppo breve per fare una esportazione come mbox delle cartelle locali. Come posso fare? Grazie g

title: Multiple Gmail accounts and their inter-account privacy on TB
creator: S-Comp82
content:
I set up multiple Gmail accounts on TB, and all work as expected. I have turned off Win 11 telemetry and I use an always-on, kill-switch VPN. On TB, each of the outgoing SMPT servers is set to a different Gmail account.

Keeping in mind the settings, above: can Google determine somehow, through TB keys/OAUTH/data/settings etc., that the user of one Gmail account is the same user of another Gmail account?

Also, I can post this question to the separate Android blog, but if anyone here knows the answer to the same question with K-9 (F-droid version), I'd appreciate it.
